articles.description: Bank ordered to pay more than $100 million to customers for 'double-dipping' junk fees and denying rewards bonuses.
articles.content: Hundreds of thousands of Bank of America customers who were charged insufficient fund fees multiple times for a single transaction are set to receive refunds, the federal government said on July 11.… [+3694 chars]
